sections.heading: Terms, defined.For purposes of sections 51-201 to 51-219:(1) Basic services shall include, but not be limited to, free loan of circulating print and nonprint materials from the local collection and general reference and information services; and(2) Nonbasic services shall include, but not be limited
sections.text: Terms, defined.For purposes of sections 51-201 to 51-219:(1) Basic services shall include, but not be limited to, free loan of circulating print and nonprint materials from the local collection and general reference and information services; and(2) Nonbasic services shall include, but not be limited to, use of:(a) Photocopying equipment;(b) Telephones, facsimile equipment, and other telecommunications equipment;(c) Media equipment;(d) Personal computers; and(e) Videocassette recording and playing equipment.SourceLaws 1990, LB 1236, ยง 1.
